TEXT.S: = Mahavun Mamahavunna = Gaga mniq Nantowseyn Sinyisyang ka alang Mahavun Mamahavunna. 256 sapah ka kneegu na sapah, 943 hiyi ka kana knhbragan na hiyi. Tnpusu seejiq o mangal 88% niqan 830 hiyi sp, rahuq na uxay tnpusu seejiq o mangal 12% niqan 113 hiyi koia. Kana ka kleegan seejiq ga, Bunun 69%, Cou 15%, Tayal 2%, Amis 1%.
